SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
CC Admin Storefront Settings

On each storefront, you can specify certain behaviors, customize the front end, set up locales and currencies, specify API extension points for certain features, and more.

REQUIRED EDITIONS

Salesforce Compatibility

Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.




B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)
General
Set important names, your domain, search metadata, behavioral flags, and other baseline values for the storefront. See Storefront General Settings.
Localization
Specify the languages and currencies that you want available on the storefront. See Select Which Locales and Currencies Your Storefront Supports.
WARNING A default locale and currency are required for the storefront to function correctly.
Configuration Settings
Override global configuration setting default values for the storefront. See Manage Configuration Settings.
Shipping
Specify the API extension point classes for:
Providing a list of shipping options and calculating shipping costs during checkout. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_api_ShippingAndHandling.
Determining allowable delivery dates that users can request during checkout. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls the ccrz.cc_api_DeliveryDate class.
Payments
Specify the API extension point class for integrating payment services. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_hk_Payment.
NOTE The Payment Types section is deprecated and applies only to CloudCraze 4.0 or earlier.
Products
Specify the API extension point classes for:
Checking product quantity rules when adding a product to a cart. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls the ccrz.cc_api_ProductQuantityRule class.
Providing search autocomplete results. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls the ccrz.cc_hk_Catalog class.
NOTE The Product Sync Integration Settings section is deprecated.
Pricing
Specify the API extension point classes for:
Adjusting prices during checkout. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_api_PriceAdjustment.
Extending pricing logic that ccrz.cc_hk_Pricing executes.
IMPORTANT The pricing extension is compatible only with the legacy version (version 1.0) of the Product List page and only if you're migrating legacy pricing extensions. For new implementations, extend the following logic service provider classes for all custom pricing functionality:
ccrz.ccLogicProductPricing
ccrz.ccLogicPLEntLists
ccrz.ccLogicCartPrice
NOTE The Price Sync Settings section is deprecated.
Inventory
This functionality is deprecated and applies only to CloudCraze 4.5 or earlier. For new implementations, extend the ccrz.ccApiProduct.fetch() method.
Orders
Specify the API extension point classes for:
Canceling a placed order. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_api_OutboundOrderCancel.
Extending order behavior that ccrz.cc_hk_Order executes.
Extending subscriptions behavior that ccrz.cc_hk_Subscriptions executes.
Extending effective accounts behavior that the ccrz.cc_hk_EffectiveAccount class executes.
Extending invoice behavior that ccrz.cc_hk_Invoice executes.
Carts
Specify the API extension point class for validating and processing carts before a storefront user can proceed to checkout. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_api_CartExtension.
NOTE To customize specific cart behavior, you can also extend or override the service and logic classes of the ccrz.ccApiCart global API.
Tax
Specify the API extension point class for calculating tax during checkout. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_hk_TaxCalculation.
SSO
Specify the API extension point class for integrating a single sign-on service for logging in to the storefront. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce calls ccrz.cc_hk_SSO.
Promotions
This functionality is deprecated and applies to only CloudCraze 4.4 or earlier. For new implementations, extend or override the service and logic classes of the ccrz.ccApiPromotion global API.
Service Management
Extend or override default service and logic classes of the global API with your own subscriber-specific code.
Themes
Enable a theme installed in your org, or specify the API extension point classes for:
Dynamically determining which theme to enable at run time. Extend ccrz.cc_hk_DynamicTheme.
Dynamically constructing the category tree at run time. For new implementations, extend ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTree.
TIP For legacy implementations that extended the ccrz.cc_hk_Category class, you can reuse your existing code by wrapping it with ccrz.ccLogicCategoryGetTreeHk. For more details, check out ccrz.cc_hk_Category (Obsolete).
Dynamically constructing the menus in the storefront’s main navigation. Extend the ccrz.cc_hk_Menu class.
Extending certain user interface behaviors, such as to customize the standard JavaScript and CSS library includes. The default extension class, ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface:v004, defines the libraries included to support the default themes that B2B Commerce for Visualforce installs.
Layouts
This functionality is deprecated and applies to only CloudCraze 4.3 or earlier. For new implementations, use the storefront’s configuration settings to specify layouts for your pages.
Storefront General Settings
Set important names, domains, search metadata, behavioral flags, and other baseline values for the storefront.
